channel.title: How do you add something with your commands?
channel.description: How do you add something with your commands?

item.title: How do you add something with your commands?
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

Heres an example of a command that add’s items

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("drop")) { teleportToX = 3233 ; <----- add the tele coords here. teleportToY = 9313 ; and here sendMessage("my dropparty homo");

Heres an example of a command that gives items

if (command.startsWith("notedbarrows") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(4717, 1000); addItem(4719, 1000); addItem(4721, 1000); addItem(4723, 1000); addItem(4709, 1000); addItem(4711, 1000); addItem(4713, 1000); addItem(4715, 1000); addItem(4754, 1000); addItem(4756, 1000); addItem(4758, 1000); addItem(4760, 1000); addItem(4746, 1000); addItem(4748, 1000); addItem(4750, 1000); addItem(4752, 1000); addItem(4733, 1000); addItem(4735, 1000); addItem(4737, 1000); addItem(4739, 1000); addItem(4727, 1000); addItem(4729, 1000); addItem(4731, 1000); addItem(4725, 1000);

     Add the item numbers that the command wil give you in the bracket.

    Save-Compile-Run.

Hope this helps ;D

Read full topic
